apps.localizedDescription:
🐝 Complete self-hosted family organization platform

✨ Features:
• 📅 Smart Calendar with automatic ToDo generation
• 🛒 Collaborative Shopping Lists with real-time sync
• 📖 Recipe Management with ingredient selection
• 📋 Intelligent ToDo System
• 👥 Family Management with role-based access
• 🔐 Secure authentication
• 🏠 Real-time activity dashboard

🔧 Self-Hosted:
• Complete privacy with your own server
• Docker deployment ready
• No external dependencies
• Username-based sharing system

versions.localizedDescription:
📅 Calendar Sync Fixed - Events Update Immediately

✅ CALENDAR SYNCHRONIZATION FIXED:
• Calendar events now sync immediately to native iOS calendar
• Persistent sync settings stored in SharedPreferences
• Manual sync button with progress feedback
• Auto-sync toggle per calendar for automatic updates
• Sync status: "Synchronisiere..." with spinner during sync
• Sync completion: "✓ Synchronisiert" with checkmark

🔄 SYNC FEATURES:
• One-time manual sync: Tap "Jetzt synchronisieren"
• Auto-sync: Toggle switch to enable automatic sync
• Progress dialog shows detailed sync feedback
• Event count displayed: "X Ereignisse synchronisiert"
• Calendar selection with iOS calendar picker
• Sync settings persist across app restarts

🎨 UX IMPROVEMENTS:
• Clear sync status indicators in calendar management
• Interactive sync buttons with loading states
• Success/Error feedback with SnackBars
• Calendar name and color displayed prominently
• Smooth animations during sync operations

🔧 TECHNICAL FIXES:
• CalendarSyncSettingsScreen with persistent storage
• device_calendar package integration
• Provider-based state management for sync settings
• Proper iOS calendar permissions handling
• Real-time UI updates during sync

📱 USER BENEFIT:
• Fampla calendar events appear in iOS Calendar app
• Two-way sync keeps calendars in perfect sync
• Manual control: Sync when you want
• Automatic sync: Set it and forget it
• Works seamlessly with other calendar apps

✨ Recipe Photos & Shopping List Rename - UX Improvements

📸 RECIPE PHOTOS - Take Photos Directly:
• 📷 Camera support when creating/editing recipes
• 🖼️ Dialog with camera OR gallery option
• 🍽️ Visual recipe documentation with photos
• 🎯 Practical use: Photo of finished dish, ingredients, cooking steps

🛒 SHOPPING LIST RENAME FIXED:
• ✏️ Rename shopping lists via PUT /api/v1/shopping/:id
• 🎨 Update name, description, color, is_archived
• ✅ Backend API route fully implemented
• 🔧 No more 404 errors when renaming lists

🎨 UI/UX ENHANCEMENTS:
• Recipe photo dialog: "Foto aufnehmen" or "Aus Galerie wählen"
• Shopping list edit dialog now works correctly
• Localization strings added (DE/EN)
• Consistent photo picker across all features

🔧 TECHNICAL IMPROVEMENTS:
• Backend: PUT route for shopping list updates
• Frontend: Camera/Gallery dialog in recipe screens
• ImageProcessingService already supported backend
• Base64 image handling for reliable sync

📱 PRACTICAL USE CASES:
• 📷 Take photo of finished dish for recipe
• 🥗 Document cooking steps with photos
• 🍽️ Visual recipe collection
• ✏️ Organize shopping lists with custom names
• 🎨 Color-code lists by category/priority

📸 Shopping Item Photos - Visual Shopping Lists

✨ NEW FEATURE - Item Photos:
• 📷 Take photos of shopping items with camera
• 🖼️ Select photos from gallery
• 👁️ View full-size photos in item details dialog
• 🔍 Photo thumbnails in shopping list view

🛒 ENHANCED SHOPPING EXPERIENCE:
• Item detail dialog with photo preview
• Photo management: Camera, Gallery, Remove
• Automatic image compression (1024x1024, 85% quality)
• Base64 storage for reliable sync

• Full-size photo preview in detail dialog

🔧 TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION:
• Backend: image_base64 column in shopping_items table
• Frontend: ImagePicker integration with camera/gallery

📱 PRACTICAL USE CASES:
• 🧴 Photo of specific detergent brand
• 🍷 Wine bottle label for exact product
• 📦 Package design to remember specific variant

• 🛍️ Visual shopping assistance in store

🔄 Offline-First Improvements - Login & Sync Fixes

✅ LOGIN PERSISTENCE FIXED:
• Login bleibt jetzt bei Netzwechsel erhalten (WiFi→LTE)
• Optimistische Authentifizierung mit cached Daten
• Token-Validierung mit 3 Retry-Versuchen (1s, 2s, 4s backoff)
• Background-Validierung blockiert UI nicht mehr
• Logout nur bei explizitem 401, nicht bei Netzwerk-Timeout

🔄 SYNC AFTER OFFLINE FIXED:
• Notizen synchronisieren automatisch nach Offline-Phase
• Force-Refresh vom API bei Netzwerk-Wiederherstellung
• Sync Service ruft jetzt echte API-Daten ab
• Conflict Resolution (Last-Write-Wins) funktioniert weiterhin

🛒 SHOPPING LIST UX IMPROVED:
• Keine Fehler-Messages mehr bei normalem Offline-Betrieb
• Neue Status-Anzeige: '📴 Offline-Modus - Änderungen werden später synchronisiert'
• Status-Messages: '🔄 Synchronisiere X Änderungen...' oder '✓ Synchronisiert'
• Deutsche Fehlermeldungen für bessere UX
• Funktioniert perfekt offline im Laden

🔧 TECHNICAL IMPROVEMENTS:
• Auth Provider: Robuste Token-Validierung mit Retry-Logic
• Sync Service: Force-Refresh Parameter für Callbacks
• Notes Provider: Echte API-Sync bei Reconnect
• Shopping Provider: Status-Getter für UI-Feedback
• Recipe/Calendar/Todo Provider: Callback-Signatur angepasst

📱 USER EXPERIENCE:
• Login überlebt Netzwechsel zuverlässig
• Notizen synchen automatisch nach Offline
• Einkaufsliste funktioniert offline mit klarem Feedback
• Keine verwirrenden Fehler mehr

🔥 KRITISCHER BUGFIX - Sync Queue Payload Dekodierung

❌ PROBLEM IN v1.3.18:
• Sync Queue verarbeitete Operationen nicht korrekt
• Alle queued Operations schlugen fehl
• Offline-Änderungen wurden NICHT zum Backend synchronisiert
• Multi-Device-Sync funktionierte nicht

✅ GELÖST IN v1.3.19:
• Payload-Dekodierung vor Handler-Aufruf implementiert
• JSON String → Map Konvertierung korrekt
• Handler erhalten jetzt strukturierte Daten
• Alle Provider (Notes, Todos, Calendar, Recipe) funktionieren

🔧 TECHNISCHE DETAILS:
• database_helper speichert payload als JSON-String
• _processPendingSync dekodiert jetzt vor Handler-Aufruf
• Handler können auf payload['note_id'], payload['title'] zugreifen
• Retry Logic und Exponential Backoff funktionieren

📱 USER IMPACT:
• Offline-Änderungen werden jetzt WIRKLICH synchronisiert
• Queued Operations werden erfolgreich verarbeitet
• Multi-Device-Sync funktioniert wie erwartet
• Keine verlorenen Daten mehr

⚠️ WICHTIG:
• Bitte auf v1.3.19 updaten, v1.3.18 hatte kritischen Bug
• Offline-Änderungen aus v1.3.18 werden automatisch synchronisiert

🚀 Professional Sync Queue System with Retry Logic

✅ Major Offline Sync Improvements:
• Offline changes now reliably uploaded to backend when reconnecting
• Exponential backoff retry logic prevents data loss (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, 16s)
• Handler registration system for all entity types (Notes, Todos, Calendar, Recipes)
• Maximum 5 retries per operation with comprehensive logging
• Real API calls replace placeholder code in sync queue

🔄 Sync Architecture:
• SyncService: Central sync management with handler registration
• NotesProvider: Sync handlers for create/update/delete operations
• TodosProvider: Full sync support via TodoApiService
• CalendarProvider: Event sync with local cache updates
• RecipeProvider: Recipe sync via FamilyApiService
• ShoppingListProvider: Keeps custom SyncQueueManager (already working)

🛡️ Data Reliability:
• Conflict resolution with Last-Write-Wins remains active
• Optimistic updates for best UX
• Proper error handling and logging for debugging
• Idempotent operations for safe retries
• Industry-standard pattern (like Firebase, CouchDB, PouchDB)

📱 User Experience:
• Offline changes appear on all devices after reconnecting
• No more lost data from temporary network issues
• Automatic retry on failures
• Seamless multi-device synchronization
• Enhanced data integrity across all providers

🔄 Intelligent Conflict Resolution for Offline Edits

✅ Major Sync Improvements:
• Offline edits are now protected from being overwritten by older backend data
• Last-Write-Wins strategy based on timestamps ensures newest changes prevail
• Smart conflict resolution across Notes, Todos, Calendar, Shopping Lists, and Recipes
• Local-only items automatically queued for backend synchronization

🛡️ Data Protection:
• Notes: Compare updatedAt timestamps, preserve newer local changes
• Todos: Compare completedAt/createdAt, preserve local completion status
• Calendar: Preserve local completion status and local-only events
• Shopping Lists: Preserve local-only lists and items
• Recipes: Compare updatedAt timestamps, preserve newer local changes

🔧 Technical Enhancements:
• Implemented conflict resolution in all major providers (400+ lines)
• Debug logging for conflict detection and resolution
• Automatic sync queue integration for local changes
• Backend-authoritative when timestamps equal or missing
• Enhanced offline-first architecture

📱 User Experience:
• No more lost offline edits when going back online
• Seamless synchronization across all devices
• Automatic conflict detection and resolution
• Better data integrity and consistency
